title: Twillingate
summary: Twillingate is a town of 2,196 people[2] located on the Twillingate Islands ("Toulinquet") in Notre Dame Bay, off the north eastern shore of the island of Newfoundland in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada. The town is about 100 kilometres (62Â mi) north of Lewisporte and Gander.
